title: Document AI - Migrating from V1Beta2
abstract:
# Document AI - Migrating from V1Beta2
# Migrating from V1Beta2
Document AI's `v1beta2` API is now deprecated in favor of the [v1](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors) API, which has a superset of functionality and is officially in General Availability.
Unlike `v1beta2` , Document AI's GA offering [v1](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors) is a stateful API, meaning you need to create a [Processor](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors#resource:-processor) before you can send requests to [Process](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors/process) and [BatchProcess](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors/batchProcess) documents.
#
content:
## Creating a processor
To migrate to `v1` , first create a [Processor](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors#resource:-processor) . The following table serves as a general guideline for choosing an appropriate [ProcessorType](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processorTypes#resource:-processortype) to create, but you can consult the full [processor list](/document-ai/docs/processors-list) .
| document_type | params     | Processor type    |
|:----------------|:-------------------------|:----------------------------|
| invoice   | nan      | INVOICE_PROCESSOR   |
| general   | nan      | OCR_PROCESSOR    |
| general   | table_extraction_params | FORM_PARSER_PROCESSOR  |
| general   | form_extraction_params | FORM_PARSER_PROCESSOR  |
| general   | entity_extraction_params | FORM_PARSER_PROCESSOR  |
| general   | automl_params   | CUSTOM_EXTRACTION_PROCESSOR |
For a step-by-step guide to creating a processor, view the [guide](/document-ai/docs/create-processor) .
### Processing documents
Document AI `v1` has two APIs to accept documents: [Process](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors/process) and [BatchProcess](/document-ai/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.processors/batchProcess) . Each of these methods corresponds to a method from `v1beta2` . The methods and their differences are highlighted below.
| v1beta2 Method  | v1 Method | Migration notes                              |
|:----------------------|:-------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ProcessDocument  | Process  | InputConfig.Cloud Storage_source not supported in v1, use BatchProcess to process documents on Cloud Storage.       |
| BatchProcessDocuments | BatchProcess | In addition to accepting individual documents on Cloud Storage, v1 supports a Cloud Storage prefix to process many documents at once. |
### Client libraries
If using the [Client Libraries](/document-ai/docs/libraries) to interact with Document AI, switch from using the `DocumentUnderstandingService` to the `DocumentProcessorService` . For a detailed example of using the client libraries for `v1` , see [Document AI client libraries](/document-ai/docs/libraries) .
